plham.agent

Class RiskAverseFCNAgent

  • plham.Agent
    • plham.agent.FCNAgent
      • plham.agent.RiskAverseFCNAgent

  • public class RiskAverseFCNAgent
extends FCNAgent
    An order decision mechanism proposed in Chiarella, Iori, & Perello (2009). It employs absolute constant risk aversion (CARA) and is restricted to make no debt and no short selling.
